data.name: 5 Year Fixed Rate - Home Package Plus Special Offers for First Home Buyers
data.description: Special Offer discounts for First Home Buyers on 5 Year Fixed rates (Home Package Plus with New Lending of > $150,000)

features.additionalInfo: Rate certainty, set your rate for a term of 5 years
Ability to set up automated repayments
Guaranteed Rate to secure your fixed rate for 90 days following your application
Receive a discount of up to 20% off the first year’s annual premium on new to Suncorp Home, Landlord and/or Contents insurance policies
Receive a discount of up to 10% off the first year’s annual premium on new to Suncorp Motor insurance policies
Pay no Annual Card fee on new Suncorp Bank Platinum, Gold or Standard Credit Cards.
A discounted interest rate when you combine total home lending over $150,000 with an Everyday Options bank account
The choice of Interest Only repayments for a maximum period of five years and subject to you satisfying applicable bank criteria
No Annual Fee - The Home Package Plus fee is waived for the life of the loan for First Home Buyers
Split your loans in the package to include Variable and Fixed rate loan/s at no additional cost

eligibility.additionalInfo: First Home Buyers - Applicable for Owner Occupied First Home Buyers who qualify within their state as first home buyers.
Home Package Plus - New Home Lending of $150,000 +
Home Loans provided to approved applicants only. Credit and lending criteria applies and is subject to change without notice

fees.name: Additional Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The first valuation assessement for each loan application is provided by the Bank. If any additional valuation assessments that involve a physical inspection are obtained by us for assessing the loan security, than this fee will apply.

fees.name: Excess Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: You can request 4 bank cheques for free. An extra 5 free bank cheques are available for progress payments on construction loans. After you have used the free cheques, a fee is payable for each bank cheque requested.

fees.name: Guarantor Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if a guarantor is included in the loan. Fee is per guarantor.

fees.name: Arrears Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The bank at its discretion will charge either an Arrears Administration Fee or Default Interest if an event of default in payment occurs.

fees.name: Default Interest
fees.additionalInfo: The bank at its discretion will charge either an Arrears Administration Fee or Default Interest if an event of default in payment occurs.

fees.name: Loan Finalisation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when a loan is paid out in full, This includes settlements, refinances and payouts.

fees.name: Copy of Documents Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we are required to obtain a copy of a document, including Mortgage or title seach.

fees.name: Early Payment Interest Adjustment (EPIA)
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you, (a) Payout the loan during a Fixed Rate period (b) Pay more than the agreed monthly amount (c) Vary or break out of a Fixed Rate period.

fees.name: Home Package Plus Annual Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The Home Package Plus Fee is waived for First Home Buyers

lendingRates.additionalInfo: First Home Buyer with New Lending > $150,000
